title: Lesson 01 – One Minute Zulu
category: how to say goodbye in zulu
how to say hello in zulu
description: In lesson 1 of One Minute Zulu you will learn to say “hello” and “goodbye”. You’ll also learn a little about where Zulu is spoken. Members’ Materials | Purchase Season Pass | iTunes | RSS
